commands.name: zip-all-plugins
commands.description: Zip both ai-story-maker and API Gateway folders
commands.command: cd ai-story-maker && chmod +x zip_current_folder.sh && ./zip_current_folder.sh && cd ../"API Gateway" && chmod +x zip_current_folder.sh && ./zip_current_folder.sh

commands.name: setup-zip-scripts
commands.description: Copy zip script to both plugin folders and make executable
commands.command: cp zip_current_folder.sh ai-story-maker/ && cp zip_current_folder.sh "API Gateway/" && chmod +x ai-story-maker/zip_current_folder.sh && chmod +x "API Gateway/zip_current_folder.sh"
